title: Replace homepage Hero background with provided wheat-field image (no other site changes)

requirements.summary: Ensure the homepage Hero uses the uploaded wheat-field image while keeping all other site design/layout/copy/behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section continues to reference the generated asset filename hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp.
The Hero background visually matches the uploaded wheat-field image (same scene/composition) and renders correctly on the live site.
No other sections (Navbar, About, Benefits, Visual Trust, WhatsApp CTA, Support, Footer, Privacy/Terms) have any design/copy/behavior changes.

file_operations.description: Keep the existing Hero background image reference to hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp via getGeneratedAssetUrl and ImageWithFallback; limit changes to non-behavioral edits only (e.g., comment/clarification) to ensure the rest of the site remains unchanged.

requirements.summary: Add the processed Hero WebP to static generated assets so it serves at /assets/generated/hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp and loads via the existing ImageWithFallback path.
acceptanceCriteria: A WebP file named hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp exists under frontend/public/assets/generated/.
Loading the homepage successfully displays the Hero image (no fallback placeholder) in both local dev and production builds.
The image uses the correct dimensions (1920x1080) and is optimized as WebP.

file_operations.description: Add (or replace, if already present) the processed WebP export of the uploaded wheat-field image at 1920x1080 under the generated assets directory so HeroSection loads it from /assets/generated/hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp.
